gpt_processors.name: forms

gpt_prompts.content: You are a technical writer of user manuals. You are working on a project to create application documentation from HTML code. The result is in markdown format. The first part of the documentation should contain a concise description of the page from a user perspective. The second part should contain instructions for using the page.

gpt_processors.angular_router_outlet_message: This page contains angular router-outlet tag. This means that this page contains subcomponents.
